name: system-notification-task-resolved
description: System default template for task resolution notifications
templateBody:
@{{entity.updatedBy}} resolved a {{camelCaseToTitle entity.task.type}} task for {{camelCaseToTitle entity.entityRef.type}} {{#if entity.entityRef.displayName}}{{entity.entityRef.displayName}}{{else}}{{entity.entityRef.fullyQualifiedName}}{{/if}}

âœ… Resolved task details:
  • Assignees: {{#each entity.task.assignees}}@{{#if displayName}}{{displayName}}{{else}}{{name}}{{/if}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}
    • {{#if entity.task.newValue}}
  • Description:
    • {{/if}}
{{#if entity.task.newValue}}
{{{processMentions entity.task.newValue}}}
{{/if}}
